name: Tight and Tone
description:
Weight Loss: being overweight is hard and losing weight and keeping it off is harder. Science shows that almost 100% of all people who are deficient in essential lipids are overweight. Tight and Tone helps you lose weight by using fat to burn fat, and by eliminating the pesky cravings that cause weight gain in the first place.
Powerful antioxidant: oxidants can damage your muscles and organs and cripple your health. Tight and Tone fights harmful oxidants and protects you against oxidative damage.
Lowers cholesterol: high cholesterol is common and is a major health risk. High cholesterol increases your blood pressure and your chances of heart disease. Millions of people die from high-cholesterol induced by high blood pressure every year. Tight and Tone can help reduce your cholesterol levels and support a healthy blood pressure.
Increases hormone secretion: healthy hormone secretion is necessary to lose weight, for healthy skin, shiny hair and awesome moods. Your body uses essential lipids to make the hormones you need for good health. If you are deficient in essential lipids your body cannot make the hormones you need to be healthy and to enjoy a slim body, healthy skin, shiny hair and awesome moods. Essential lipids will support optimal hormone secretion.
Increases energy levels: Tight and Tone gives you energy by fueling your energy producing cells. Essential lipids are the cleanest energy source for these cells.
Strengthens immune system: Tight and Tone will strengthen your immune system and protect your body against harmful oxidants, help optimize your hormone secretion, increase your energy levels and lower your cholesterol. Combined, these effects dramatically strengthen your immune system against minor cold and flues as well as potentially serious health conditions.

Tight and Tone works because it contains a revolutionary Lipid Complex that’s very powerful, effective and proven. Thousands of scientific studies have proven the power of the lipids in the Tight and Tone.

name: Amino Overload
description: Transformulation Labs presents AMINO OVERLOAD, one of the most potent AMINO ACID products on the market. AMINO OVERLOAD uses only the purest and cleanest ingredients available making AMINO OVERLOAD a very exclusive GMP compliant product.  AMINO OVERLOAD is a staple in providing stability and transport to muscle cell membranes. The effects of Branch Chain Amino Acids in the diet are profound. A potent ingredient in AMINO OVERLOAD is L-Leucine. As the strongest of the BCAA's, L-Leucine is what's known as a "limiting nutrient" - meaning that you must have enough L-Leucine in proportion to other amino acids in order for your body to make use of what you eat.Simply: If you suffer from an L-Leucine deficiency, your body will not be able to make use of the protein that you give it - no matter how much protein you consume.And, unless you have enough L-Luecine, the money you spend on quality food and dietary supplements will be wasted. AMINO OVERLOAD has a particular interest to bodybuilders because unlike other amino acids products, which are broken down in the liver, AMINO OVERLOAD metabolizes in the muscles. Here, they can be used to produce energy or construct new proteins. Research has shown that in both males and females, amino acid supplementation after exercise can reverse net muscle protein balance from a negative to a positive state. Additionally, amino acid ingestion reduces the rate of protein breakdown.

name: BULK-XL
description:
Transformulation Labs presents BULK-XL, one of the most potent and unique Weight Gainer powders on the market. BULK-XL uses only the purest and cleanest ingredients available making BULK-XL a very exclusive GMP compliant product. BULK-XL combines the powerful ingredients of Creatine Ethyl Ester, Waxy Maize and Arginine to provide amazing and long lasting results. BULK- XL’s main ingredient: Waxy Maize is a corn starch that has been formulated for easy and fast digestion. Waxy Maize passes through the stomach and intestines much faster than other type of carbohydrates. BULK-XL also contains the very popular Creatine Ethyl-Ester, which is the very first water soluble creatine providing the results of creatine without bloating. Bulk-XL also has Arginine Alpha Ketoglutarate, which helps dilate blood vessels and provides more nutrients to your muscles. Overall BULK-XL will provide you with all the main catalysts to assist you in sufficient and long lasting weight gain.

Suggested Use:
As an adult dietary supplement, mix one serving of BULK XL with 8 to 10 ounces of water, protein shake or preferred sports beverage. Drink WAXYBULK 15-30 minutes before workout. For Maximum weight gain, drink 3-4 servings per day.

For Maximum Results stack with: CEE Excel  and N.O. Excel

name: Laxogenin
description:
L-laxogenin, was discovered by a American scientist in 1996. It was shown to possess an anabolic/androgenic ratio similar to one of the most efficient anabolic substances, in particular Anavar but without the side effects of liver toxicity or testing positive for steroidal therapy. Athletes have found dramatic strength increases in 3-5 days, and muscle mass increases in 3-4 weeks. Muscle mass or fat loss is only a function of caloric intake. If you are a male that is a hard gainer or someone that is looking to put on extra lean muscle and most important, keep it. This is the ONLY product EVER designed to do this without steroidal influence. Product is great for drug testing and does not test positive for steroids. Tests showed that protein synthesis increased by over 200% , the key to lean muscle growth and accelerated repair. Body fat reduction is one of the key components of this molecule. When you restrict your calories you reduce body fat dramatically. In testing the molecule has balance cortisol response which is the major cornerstone to healthy recovery and reduction of muscle wasting.

This product may be taken for post surgical injury repair. It regenerates the healing process by 10 fold with most surgeries. It is currently being tested for internal fistula repair, shoulder repair, knee surgery and general anabolic regeneration issues related to aging.

Aging is now viewed as a disease state. The catabolic, or destruction of mature healthy cells has been a problem for science throughout mankind. This product is the closest product to repairing or regenerating cellular decline. What does this mean in plain English? Basically, it is the most important preventative, regenerative process in modern medicine. This is a plant sterol from plants. Its purpose in the plant kingdom is to insure survival in inclement conditions. It does the same in the human body. The blood of the plant is only 1 molecule apart from the blood of a human. Recent science has concluded that plant sterols for age related conditions, such as, DNA repair and regeneration, are some of the most dynamic in modern medicine.

Recommendations for use: For Men take 1-2 with breakfast and 1-2 with dinner. For Women take 1 capsule at breakfast and 1 capsule at dinner.Remember: More isn’t better. This act’s as a signaling agent. Not a steroid.
Recommended Test Panels:

ASI for Male and Female: Adrenal Panel
FHP, Cycling Female Hormone Panel
PHP-2 PeriMenopausal Hormone Panel
PHP-1 Menopausal Hormone Panel

Testing:
Product is being currently tested for the reversal of the following diseases:

1.Osteopenia
2.Osteoporosis
3.Arthritis
4.Diabetes, all forms
5.Injury repair, all types
6.Knee injuries, specific
7.Shoulder injuries, specific
8.Children during adrenal development
9.Cancer, MS, Lupus etc..

Q & A
What are the two pathways through which Laxogenin works? RNA and Ribosome Assembly.

The literature given suggests that one pathway involves an increased rate in decoding RNA. But that's still too technical for me to fully grasp, and I can't find an explanation of the second pathway.

Basically, he is saying that by decoding RNA he is able to target the action of the molecular structure to stimulate a specific protein action. It is a catalyst for proper targeting function in the body. In this case, anabolic activity.

Example:
HGH therapy is a collection of 191 Amino Acids that are assembled and delivered by injection. If you take one step in reverse and figure out the sequencing equation of RNA, you can create the assembly and have the ribosomes create the assembly. The only thing you have to determine is how much to take to evoke the specified action. Which we did.

Messenger RNA tells the ribosome, a ribosome is a small, dense organelle in cells that assembles proteins and ribosomes build proteins from the genetic instructions held within a messenger RNA and assemble what kind of proteins to make and how much to crank out. They are basically the expediter.

What is your experience with female weight loss?

All of the Women that have tried this product say that they will never stop taking it. Better muscle tone, better & healthier appetite, better cellulite reduction and most important skin toning, smoothing effect.

What is your experience with male weight loss?

Remember, this product works synergistically with caloric intake. If you restrict your calorie intake and eat every 2.5 hours throughout the day and don’t miss your breakfast shake with Fiber and Fats for a complete meal, then you will lose fat without losing lean body mass! Most important and highly overlooked.
